-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | markdown parser with papillon
--   
--   Now. Implemented only following features.
--   
--   Paragraph, header, code, list, image
--   
--   Not yet implemented following features.
--   
--   newline, bold, quote, link, horizontal line
@package markdown-pap
@version 0.0.1.5

module Text.Markdown.Pap
parse :: String -> Maybe [Text]
data Text
Header :: Int -> String -> Text
Paras :: [String] -> Text
Code :: String -> Text
List :: List -> Text
Link :: String -> Address -> Title -> Text
Image :: String -> Address -> Title -> Text
type List = [List1]
data List1
OrdItem :: String -> List -> List1
BulItem :: String -> List -> List1
